title: Enhancing Patient Care Competency: Virtual Reality-Based Clinical Decision-Making Training for Physical Therapy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Enhancement of clinical symptom analysis and differential diagnosis capabilities for upper limb dysfunction patients in a virtual reality simulation environment

Learners can analyze diabetes patient cases in VR-based patient interaction simulations (3+ sessions), establish personalized treatment plans (medication/diet/exercise) with ≥80% accuracy, and determine intervention strategies meeting ≥4 out of 5 simulation evaluation rubric criteria (communication, clinical judgment, safety).
Development of systematic clinical decision-making processes based on metacognitive awareness and the ability to create evaluation reports

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
